Sentence.sentence: Measuring emissions is not a precise science, particularly when it comes to issues surrounding land use; not all nations have released up-to-date data, and in any case, emissions from some sectors such as aviation are not included in national statistics.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Even worse, after refreshing our email or reading the same studies over and over, we are too exhausted when we land to soldier on with (继续处理) the emails that have inevitably still piled up.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: I don't mean to imply that overall job growth doesn't have an impact on one's ability to land a job.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: If the farm is well managed and has enough land, and the desire to convert is sincere, a relationship can begin.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: In fact, they sometimes take their own lives because they are treated so badly, and because they believe they will be born again, free and living in their own land.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: The battle is currently being waged on land, in greenhouses at the University of Barcelona.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题(第二套)阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: The message to young people who might not otherwise be able to afford to break into the business is, "You can purchase this $3 million piece of land here, because I'm guaranteeing you today you'll have 1, 000 Bison on it."
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: The results of her decades worth of careful observations were detailed paintings and descriptions of European insects, followed by unconventional visuals and stories of insects and animals from a land that most at the time could only imagine.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Though he didn't come from a farming family, from a young age tim Joseph was fascinated by the idea of living off the land.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Twenty years ago, the Urban Land Institute defined the two types of cities that dominated the US landscape: smaller cities that operated around standard 9-5 business hours and large metropolitan areas that ran all 24 hours of the day.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: We often hear people say that America is a land of opportunity, a country built on hope to aspire to greatness on the American Dream.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section C

means: logic AND 逻辑与
[人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 兰德地貌名称，来源于古英语，含义是“土地，领土”(land,territory)
[人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 兰德地貌名称，或住所名称，来源于中世纪英语、古英语，含义是“林中空地”(forest glade)
[地名] [美国] 兰德
[地名] [冰岛、挪威] 兰德（地区）

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都有"土地，土，泥"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: earth, clay, dirt, land, dust, soil, mud, ground
means: earth ： 多指地表带有水分的泥土，较具体。
clay ： 特指潮湿时发粘，而火烤后变坚硬的泥土。
dirt ： 指地表的干松泥土。
land ： 含义笼统。指与河流、海洋相对的陆地，也指可耕种的土地。
dust ： 特指土壤干燥后，飞扬于空中的细微泥土。
soil ： 特指适宜栽种农作物或生长各种植物的泥土。
mud ： 指湿土，尤指雨后稀泥、污泥。
ground ： 通常指大地的表面，也可指土壤、泥土或场地。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"国家"之意。
means: nation ： 普通用词，指在某一国土定居的人民、民族，强调人民。
state ： 正式用词，指政治概念上的国家，即由政府所代表的国家。
country ： 普通用词，侧重国土与人民。
land ： 常用于文学中，侧重国土，带感情色彩。
power ： 特指拥有强大军事力量，在国际事务中有较强权威或影响的国家，即强国、大国。

example.en: I knew he's a land shark, because I went very often to the Customs before.
example.zh: 我早就知道他是个海关官员，因为我以前经常去海关。

Sentence.sentence: A friend of mine owns an area of land in western victoria.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Bradford sold the building and land to a local development firm, which plans to build a shopping complex on the land where the theater is located.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Developers, and established large farmers makes owning one's own land unattainable for many new farmers.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: From 2004 to 2013, agricultural land values doubled, and they continue to rise in many regions.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Have you ever heard of the trees that are homes to animals both on land and sea?
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 单项填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Her simple act landed parks in prison.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: I don't see it as a lawless land.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语四川卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: I left for the land of warmth and Vitamin C, thinking of beaches and orange trees.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: If you're lucky enough to land such an accommodation, though, be sure you're 100 percent on time.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 主旨概括 原文

Sentence.sentence: In 1943, a Mexican farmer was surprised to see smoke rising from a small part of his land.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: In the ocean, we fished for top predators such as cod on an industrial scale, while on land, we killed off large predators such as wolves.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: It ends abruptly at 3, 000 meters, giving way to lands of low growing plants.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷I 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: One crucial factor is secure access to land.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Over five generations the land has been too wet for cropping.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: She ultimately purchased a small piece of land with her husband and began growing their own foods.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖北卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Since finishing my studies at harvard and oxford, I've watched one friend after another land high-ranking, high-paying wall street jobs.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: The effect is so powerful that scientists speak of songbirds and seabirds being"captured"by searchlights on land or by the light from gas flares on marine oil platforms.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: The polar bear is found in the Arctic circle and some big land masses as far south as Newfoundland.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷I 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Trainees also get a good start on their wilderness survival badge as they learn about water-and land-survival through designed tasks and their search and rescue of "downed " pilot.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: We have no land ethic yet,  but we have at least drawn nearer the point of admitting that birds should continue as a matter of intrinsic right,regardless of the presence or absence of economic advantage to us.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年考研翻译原文

Sentence.sentence: To sum up: a system of conservation based solely on economic self-interest is hopelessly lopsided It tends to ignore, and thus eventually to eliminate, many elements in the land community that lack commercial value, but that are essential to its healthy functioning.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年考研翻译原文

Sentence.sentence: One basic weakness in a conservation system based wholly on economic motives is that most members of the land community have no economic value.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年考研翻译原文

Sentence.sentence: Those who jumped without a job haven’t always landed in top positions quickly.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The colonists’ first glimpse of the new land was a sight of dense woods.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年考研翻译原文

Sentence.sentence: Only Ukip, sensing its chance, has sided with those pleading for a more considered approach to using green land Its Campaign to Protect Rural England struck terror into many local Conservative parties.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A small but vocal group of Hawaiians and environments have long viewed their presence as disrespect for sacred land and a painful reminder of the occupation of what was once a sovereign nation.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: British Land Art as shown in this well selected, but relatively modestly scaled exhibition wasn't about imposing on the landscape, more a kind of landscape-orientated light conceptual art created passing through.
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Emerging in the late sixties and reaching a peak in the Seventies, Land Art was one of a range of new forms, including Body Art,Performance Art, Action Art and Installation Art, which pushed art beyond the traditional confines of the studio and gallery.
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Generally however British land artists preferred to get away from towns, gravitating towards landscapes that are traditionally considered beautiful such as the Lake District or the Wiltshire Downs.
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: If you get lost without a phone or a compass, and you  literally can't find north, a few tricks to help you navigate back  to civilization, one of which is to follow the land.
Sentence.come: 2019年考研真题（英语一）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: Indeed, while you might assume that an exhibition of Land Art would consist only of records of works rather than the works themselves, Long's photograph of his work is the work.
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Jokes that work one person won't necessarily land with another, So, adapt your style accordingly to type.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Long is Britain's best-known Land Artist and his Stone circle, a perfect ring of purplish rocks from Portishead beach laid out on the gallery floor, represents the elegant, rarefied side of the form.
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Only Ukip, sensing its chance, has sided with those pleading for a more considered approach to using green land.
Sentence.come: 2016年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Rather than portraying landscape, land artists used the physical substance of the land itself as their medium.
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: The British land art, typified by Richard Long's piece, was not only more domestically scaled, but a lot quirkier than its American counterpart.
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

means.word_mean: 陆地, 陆上, 地面

sentences.en: The storm blew over land and sea.
sentences.cn: 暴风雨在陆地上和海上呼啸。

sentences.en: Most mammals live on land.
sentences.cn: 大多数哺乳动物生活在陆地上。

sentences.en: The ship came safely to land.
sentences.cn: 船平安靠岸。

sentences.en: He has visited many different lands.
sentences.cn: 他游览过许多不同的国家。

sentences.en: There was once a grievous famine in the land.
sentences.cn: 这个国家曾有一次大饥荒。

sentences.en: This is my native land and I'll defend it with my life!
sentences.cn: 这是我的祖国, 我将用生命保卫她。

means.word_mean: 土地, 田地; 地产

sentences.en: There is a lot of good corn land around here.
sentences.cn: 这附近有许多良田。

sentences.en: The farmer has just bought a new piece of land.
sentences.cn: 这位农民刚刚又买了一块地。

sentences.en: When are we landing?
sentences.cn: 我们什么时候着陆?

sentences.en: The passengers landed.
sentences.cn: 乘客都已上岸。

sentences.en: Try to catch the ball before it lands.
sentences.cn: 要把球接住, 不要让它落地。

sentences.en: The pilot landed the airliner safely.
sentences.cn: 驾驶员使客机安全着陆。

means.word_mean: 降临；使陷于（困境）；使不得不应付

sentences.en: The teacher hoped to land some good students.
sentences.cn: 老师希望得到好学生。

sentences.en: He landed the first prize.
sentences.cn: 他获得一等奖。

sentences.en: A friend of mine landed me a three-roomed flat.
sentences.cn: 我的一个朋友给我弄到了一套三居室的公寓。

sentences.en: She landed him a guide.
sentences.cn: 她给他找来一个向导。

sentences.en: Please land a book for me.
sentences.cn: 请给我弄本书。

jx.jx_en_mean: what the state of affairs is

lj.lj_ly: let's keep it to ourselves until we see how the land lies.
lj.lj_ls: 我们看清事态之前先对此事保密。

phrase.cizu_name: in the land of the living

lj.lj_ly: after some ups and downs he has finally landed on his feet.
lj.lj_ls: 经过一些曲折，他最终成功。

jx.jx_en_mean: live on whatever food one can obtain by hunting, gathering, or subsistence farming

lj.lj_ly: the ship landed up on the south coast of Devon.

jx.jx_en_mean: (land up with)end up with (a certain, usually unwelcome, situation)

lj.lj_ly: I landed up with three broken ribs.
lj.lj_ls: 我以折断三根肋骨为结局。

entry.def: Land is an area of ground, especially one that is used for a particular purpose such as farming or building.
entry.tran: 土地；田地；（尤指）耕作用地，建筑用地

example.ex: Good agricultural land is in short supply.
example.tran: 良田短缺。

example.ex: ...160 acres of land.
example.tran: 160英亩土地

entry.def: You can refer to an area of land which someone owns as their land or their lands.

example.ex: Their home is on his father's land...
example.tran: 他们的家建在他父亲拥有的地皮上。

example.ex: His lands were poorly farmed.
example.tran: 他的田地耕种不当。

entry.def: If you talk about the land, you mean farming and the way of life in farming areas, in contrast to life in the cities.

example.ex: Living off the land was hard enough at the best of times.
example.tran: 即使在年景最好的时候，务农为生也是相当艰辛的。

entry.def: Land is the part of the world that consists of ground, rather than sea or air.

example.ex: It isn't clear whether the plane went down over land or sea.
example.tran: 不清楚飞机是坠毁在陆地上还是海里。

example.ex: ...a stretch of sandy beach that was almost inaccessible from the land.
example.tran: 从陆路几乎难以到达的一片沙滩

entry.def: You can use land to refer to a country in a poetic or emotional way.

example.ex: Her husband's  body lies buried 2,000 miles away in a strange land.
example.tran: 她丈夫的遗体埋葬在两千英里外一个陌生的国度。

example.ex: ...blessed lands of sun and sea and olive trees.
example.tran: 有着阳光、海水和橄榄树的美丽国度

entry.def: When someone or something lands, they come down to the ground after moving through the air or falling.

example.ex: He was sent flying into the air and landed 20ft away...
example.tran: 他被抛到空中，落在20英尺外的地方。

example.ex: Three mortar shells had landed close to a crowd of people.
example.tran: 3枚迫击炮弹落在人群旁。

entry.def: When someone lands a plane, ship, or spacecraft, or when it lands, it arrives somewhere after a journey.

example.ex: The jet landed after a flight of just under three hours...
example.tran: 这架喷气式飞机在飞行了将近3小时后降落了。

example.ex: He landed his troops on the western shore...
example.tran: 他率部队在西岸登陆。

entry.def: To land goods somewhere means to unload them there at the end of a journey, especially by ship.

example.ex: The vessels will have to land their catch at designated ports.
example.tran: 船只必须在指定的港口把捕到的鱼卸下。

example.ex: ...a five-man gang which landed the huge shipment on the Cornwall coast.
example.tran: 在康沃尔海岸卸下这一大批货的五人团伙

entry.def: If you land in an unpleasant situation or place or if something lands you in it, something causes you to be in it.

example.ex: He landed in a psychiatric ward...
example.tran: 他被关进了精神病房。

example.ex: This is not the first time his exploits have landed him in trouble.
example.tran: 这已经不是他第一次因自己的冒险行为而惹上麻烦了。

entry.def: If someone or something lands you with a difficult situation, they cause you to have to deal with the difficulties involved.

example.ex: The other options simply complicate the situation and could land him with more expense.
example.tran: 其他办法只会使情况复杂化，而且可能给他带来更大花销。

entry.def: If something lands somewhere, it arrives there unexpectedly, often causing problems.

example.ex: Two days later the book had already landed on his desk...
example.tran: 两天后那本书竟然已经摆在了他的书桌上。

example.ex: This was the weekend that the war finally landed on their doorstep.
example.tran: 在这个周末，战火终于烧到了他们的家门口。

entry.def: If you land a fish, you succeed in catching it and getting it out of the water.

example.ex: One angler landed fish of 10 lb and 9 lb on the same day.
example.tran: 一名垂钓者在同一天分别钓到了10磅和9磅重的鱼。

entry.def: If you land something that is difficult to get and that many people want, you are successful in getting it.

example.ex: He landed a place on the graduate training scheme...
example.tran: 他在毕业生培训计划中赢得了一个位置。

example.ex: His flair with hair soon landed him a part-time job at his local barbers.
example.tran: 他的美发天赋令他很快在当地一家发廊找到一份兼职工作。

entry.def: If someone lands a blow or punch or if their blow or punch lands, they hit someone.

example.ex: De Leon landed a punch on the Italian's mouth after the end of the eleventh round...
example.tran: 11个回合过后，德莱昂一拳击在那个意大利人的嘴巴上。

example.ex: I could hear the blows landing as he appealed for help.
example.tran: 在他求救的同时我能听到拳头落下的声音。

means.word_mean: 1. the land on which real estate is located;

sentences.sentence: "he built the house on land leased from the city"

means.word_mean: 2. material in the top layer of the surface of the earth in which plants can grow (especially with reference to its quality or use);

sentences.sentence: "the land had never been plowed"
"good agricultural soil"

means.word_mean: 3. the solid part of the earth's surface;

sentences.sentence: "the plane turned away from the sea and moved back over land"
"the earth shook for several minutes"
"he dropped the logs on the ground"

means.word_mean: 4. territory over which rule or control is exercised;

sentences.sentence: "his domain extended into Europe"
"he made it the law of the land"

means.word_mean: 5. the territory occupied by a nation;

sentences.sentence: "he returned to the land of his birth"
"he visited several European countries"

means.word_mean: 6. a domain in which something is dominant;

sentences.sentence: "the untroubled kingdom of reason"
"a land of make-believe"
"the rise of the realm of cotton in the south"

means.word_mean: 7. extensive landed property (especially in the country) retained by the owner for his own use;

sentences.sentence: "the family owned a large estate on Long Island"

means.word_mean: 8. the people who live in a nation or country;

sentences.sentence: "a statement that sums up the nation's mood"
"the news was announced to the nation"
"the whole country worshipped him"

means.word_mean: 9. a politically organized body of people under a single government;

sentences.sentence: "the state has elected a new president"
"African nations"
"students who had come to the nation's capitol"
"the country's largest manufacturer"
"an industrialized land"

means.word_mean: 10. working the land as an occupation or way of life;

sentences.sentence: "farming is a strenuous life"
"there's no work on the land any more"
"The bird landed on the highest branch"
"The plane landed in Istanbul"

means.word_mean: 2. cause to come to the ground;

sentences.sentence: "the pilot managed to land the airplane safely"
"this may land you in jail"
"The drug smugglers landed the heroin on the beach of the island"
"He landed several blows on his opponent's head"
"The ship landed in Pearl Harbor"

means.word_mean: 7. shoot at and force to come down;

sentences.sentence: "the enemy landed several of our aircraft"

means.word_mean: 1. relating to or characteristic of or occurring on land;

sentences.sentence: "land vehicles"

means.word_mean: 2. operating or living or growing on land

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch land and German Land

means: 陆地
地带，土地
地产，地皮
国度；国土
（使）降落，着陆
跳落，跌落
使陷于（困境）
成功得到，赢得
捕到，钓到（鱼）
卸（货）

[地名] [冰岛、挪威] 兰德（地区）

sentences.en: Living off the land was hard enough at the best of times.

sentences.cn: 这些问题和土地需求量与可获得性 、 政策 、 知识 、 标准 、 意识 、 参与和投资有关.
sentences.en: These relate to land requirements and availability, policies, knowledge, standards, awareness, participation and investment.

sentences.cn: 那供水系统呢, 能耕种的土地和可获得的工作 呢 ?
sentences.en: What about water supply , the availability of cultivable land or jobs?

sentences.cn: 获释放者可以获得土地.
sentences.en: Emancipists were given land.

sentences.cn: 要获得他的第一个年度车手冠军Raikkonen有很多工作要做.
sentences.en: Raikkonen has his work cut out if he is to land his first drivers'championship.

sentences.cn: 但是仅仅实行一种平均主义的土地改革方案是不能保证获得农业和农村发展的成功的.
sentences.en: But an egalitarian land reform program alone is no guarantee of successful agricultural and rural development.

sentences.cn: 永恒的演义故事如下六个派系斗争获得至高无上的土地.
sentences.en: Timeless Kingdoms follows the story of six factions struggles to gain supremacy over the land.

sentences.cn: 随着美国获得新的领土, 它控制着大片没有居民的土地.
sentences.en: As the U.S. gained new territory, it controlled large areas of unsettled land.

sentences.cn: 传说荷兰填海造地获得的土地面积比它原来的国土面积还大.
sentences.en: A legend goes that Holland reclaims more land from the sea than its original size.

sentences.cn: 他获得一等奖.
sentences.en: He landed the first prize.

sentences.cn: 我想06年后德国要在本土获得世界杯就得多等等了.
sentences.en: Das n ? chste Mal nach 2006 eine WM im eigenen Land zu haben, wird sicherlich noch dauern.

sentences.cn: 几十年来,农民们一直为获得政府的无偿土地补助而斗争着.
sentences.en: For decades farmers had been fighting for government grants of free land.

sentences.cn: 女性农民通产需要拥有土地来获得贷款和其它资源.
sentences.en: Women farmers to own land to receive receive loans and other resources.

sentences.cn: 其中一个推动因素是因为土地获得的压力.
sentences.en: One push factor is due to pressure on land availability.

sentences.cn: 土地改革方案是不能保证获得农业和农村发展的成功的.
sentences.en: But an land reform program alone is no guarantee of successful agricultural and rural development.

sentences.cn: 恭喜你获得那份合约.

sentences.cn: 我们幸运地以低价获得一块贵土.

sentences.cn: 要么是为了抑制土地投机,垄断土地资源和获得土地资产收益.

sentences.cn: 她在几部电视片中获得了角色.
sentences.en: She landed roles in several television movies.

sentences.cn: 19世纪铁路建筑商曾获得政府拨给的土地和补助金.
sentences.en: Railroad builders accepted grants of land and public subsidies in the 19 th century.

sentences.cn: 飞机获得了着陆许可.

sentences.cn: 他们从战争中得到的可能是掠夺品, 也可能是获得土地或自由,这随着时间 、 地点和情况而定.
sentences.en: Whether this stake be loot, land or liberty according to time, place and circumstance.

sentences.cn: 集伟 、 振海 、 海鸟发展等企业也获得了一定数量土地.

sentences.cn: 灌溉经常令明显干涸的土地获得大丰收.

sentences.cn: 波斯尼亚导演丹尼斯-塔诺维奇执导的《无主之地》获得了最佳编剧奖.

sentences.cn: 当地人把地围了起来,以获得排斥他人购买该地的优先购买权.
sentences.en: The local people fenced the land to preempt it against other claimants.
